name: Mimic Attacks!
description:
Mimics attack! is an atmospheric First Person Shooter game where you need to survive the mimics and find the portal to another world!

During the pandemic, I came to the realization that I should pursue my dreams, to be more creative and show my skills to the world. I've been learning how to make since then, and this is one of my first mini games that I'm building as a game protfolio. 

Hope you try it and enjoy it, any feedback is very welcome!

Thanks!

-Cris
